text: Avdullah Hoti (born 4 February 1976) is a Kosovar politician. He was the Prime Minister of Kosovo from 3 June 2020 until 22 March 2021. He was the Minister of Finance between 2014 and 2017 in the PDK/LDK coalition government. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Kosovo
title: Avdullah Hoti
